item.description:
It's summertime and you know what that means!  A barbecue with some outdoor games (or indoor games :-( ).  So how about a pre-Fourth of July barbecue?

We will have be having a family-like barbecue (without all the dysfunction and drama of a real family) with a beautiful lawn that should allow us to play various games at once as well as relax.  

Weather permitting, we will be playing outdoor games so if you like bocce, badminton, horseshoes, frisbee, tossing balls, sunning yourself or showing off yo-yo skills, please come and join us!  If the weather decides to become very wet, we will be doing traditional board and card games indoors.  The forecast says there is a 50/50 chance of sun or rain so we won't know what we are playing until the last minute.  But that just adds a little excitement to life, doesn't it? :-)

Oh yeah, and this will be a joint meetup with the Boston C&C crew.  So come meet old friends and new!  ;-)

If you wish to attend this event, all I ask is that you follow this simple process:

1. Please bring a dish to share and mention that in your RSVP.

2. Please take a look at what others have already posted, so we don't end up all eating the same thing. :-)

I will take care of the rest.  I will supply a small amount of burgers, hot dogs and veggie burgers as well as drinks and plates.  But the rest of the food is up to you guys.  If there is something in particular you would like on the grill, please feel free to bring.  

One last thing, while we have a few outdoor games, we don't have everything (I actually don't have a badminton set, lol)  So if you want to play badminton or something else in particular, feel free to bring it.  Thanks! :-)

Hope to see you there!
